properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Give me joy in my heart
keep me praising.
Give me joy in my
heart I pray.
Give me joy in my heart
keep me praising.
Keep me praising till the
break of day.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Sing hosanna, sing hosanna
sing hosanna to the
King of kings.
Sing hosanna, sing hosanna,
sing hosanna to the King.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Give me faith in my heart
keep me striving.
Give me faith in my heart
I pray.
Give me faith in my heart,
keep me striving.
Keep me striving 'till
the end of day.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Give me love in my heart
keep me serving.
Give me love in my heart
I pray.
Give me love in my heart,
keep me serving.
Keep me serving 'till
the end of day.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Give me hope in my heart
keep me going.
Give me hope in my heart
I pray.
Give me hope in my heart,
keep me going.
Keep me going 'till
the end of day.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Give my oil in my lamp,
keep me burning.
Give me oil in my lamp,
I pray.
Give my oil in my lamp,
keep me burning.
Keep me burning
'till the end of day.
